BugInstance.message: org.apache.shardingsphere.readwritesplitting.distsql.segment.ReadwriteSplittingRuleSegment.getReadDataSources() may expose internal representation by returning ReadwriteSplittingRuleSegment.readDataSources

new org.apache.shardingsphere.readwritesplitting.distsql.segment.ReadwriteSplittingRuleSegment(String, String, Collection, String, AlgorithmSegment) may expose internal representation by storing an externally mutable object into ReadwriteSplittingRuleSegment.readDataSources

org.apache.shardingsphere.readwritesplitting.distsql.statement.AlterReadwriteSplittingRuleStatement.getRules() may expose internal representation by returning AlterReadwriteSplittingRuleStatement.rules

new org.apache.shardingsphere.readwritesplitting.distsql.statement.AlterReadwriteSplittingRuleStatement(Collection) may expose internal representation by storing an externally mutable object into AlterReadwriteSplittingRuleStatement.rules

org.apache.shardingsphere.readwritesplitting.distsql.statement.CreateReadwriteSplittingRuleStatement.getRules() may expose internal representation by returning CreateReadwriteSplittingRuleStatement.rules

new org.apache.shardingsphere.readwritesplitting.distsql.statement.CreateReadwriteSplittingRuleStatement(boolean, Collection) may expose internal representation by storing an externally mutable object into CreateReadwriteSplittingRuleStatement.rules
org.apache.shardingsphere.readwritesplitting.distsql.statement.DropReadwriteSplittingRuleStatement.getNames() may expose internal representation by returning DropReadwriteSplittingRuleStatement.names

new org.apache.shardingsphere.readwritesplitting.distsql.statement.DropReadwriteSplittingRuleStatement(boolean, Collection) may expose internal representation by storing an externally mutable object into DropReadwriteSplittingRuleStatement.names
